title: Streets empty and shops close as US strikes confirm Iranian fears
summary_full: Within minutes of the attack, traffic-choked streets slowed and long queues formed outside bakeries and gas stations. Police and security forces were out in numbers
summary_public: Within minutes of the attack, traffic-choked streets slowed and long queues formed outside bakeries and gas stations. Police and security forces were out in numbers

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Streets empty and shops close as US strikes confirm Iranian fears
